english.segment2: Father to the fatherless. Redeemer of my soul. My life is Yours forever. My heart will always know
english.segment4: Your mercy saved me mercy made me whole. Your mercy found me called me as Your own
english.segment6: Here I am a sinner. Broken and in need of You. Take my life and wash my fears away. For You are the great I Am. Rest assured I feel Your hand. Holding me until the darkness clears
